phrases: We were in search of Naraku,
when a ghastly demon came afterus.
But a young girl from the Wolf-Demon Tribe appeared.
I will make you my wife, Ayame.
Did Naraku send that as a decoy?
We will find out once we capture it.
It may know Naraku's whereabouts, too.
Then the elder of the Wolf-Demon Tribe is yourgrandfather?
But there must be a reason
for coming down the mountain like this?
but a strange demonic aura came down from the northern mountain.
Gramps said it smells of a demon.
in the east and north, and south and west increased.
So Gramps decided to marry me off to one of the strong young ones
Luckily, Koga and I were already promised.
I said I do not remember!
Gramps thought that Koga would be able to get followers.
And I did not mind marrying, if it is to Koga.
So it was not just a political marriage.
Getting all worked up over a stupid demonic aura!
Yourrole may be to make peace...
but all you got to do is crack theirheads together
and make them see some sense!
In orderto bring the tribes together, we need their trust!
You have to get married and be settled.
Then I am not suited forthat.
What I want to do more than anything right now,
I do not have time for anything else!
Stop listening only to what the elder says.
Do what you want to do.
That is the end of this subject.
He must have let the demon go!
I can smell it... it is real close.
Koga, let us go back to Inuyasha and the others.
But this is not the time for such words!
Koga keeps saying he loves her.
Besides, I need to ask you a question!
It does not want to let us pass.
You will not get away now!
I do not have any right to ask you this.
But I will leave Kagome in your care.
You are just huge, that is all!
Now that you have caught up with me...
Why do not you get away?
Koga is doing his best to protect you.
Koga is fighting to protect both you and me.
Putting Kagome in danger like this!
It is only because you stupidly let the demon escape!
Do not get tangled up in that demon's hair.
I will destroy him in one blow with my Wind Scar.
Coming into the picture like this!
I am going to get the demon!
I will devour you, shard and all!
You are the only one who can!
I do not care what happens to Koga.
But I cannot let you have the Sacred Jewel shard!
No one will get in my way now!
I will use the Sacred Jewel's power...
and get back my former self.
That demon said that he had been freed from Naraku.
That Naraku... he abandoned me and the castle.
He was not an incarnation that Naraku created out of his body?
Naraku did not need him anymore?
Well... he certainly does not look very useful.
You are too ugly even for Naraku's demon.
you have been fooling around with trash like this?
Mutt, I will play with you later.
You cried about being abandoned, huh?
you do not know where Naraku is?!
Naraku has escaped to a place
where no one can touch him.
Where no one can touch him?!
Naraku cut me off in the midst of things.
I do not know Naraku's plans beyond that.
It seems he is telling the truth.
Cannot be helped if you do not know.
There is one thing this trash of a demon is good for.
It is the spiritual power of the iris.
Damn, I cannot use the Wind Scar!
I have eaten the Sacred Jewel shards!
As if you can kill me!
And make sure all the wolves rememberit.
So you will use all the wolves to track the scent?
And search for Naraku high and low?
If wolves were able to sniff that Naraku out,
I would have done it long ago!
Kagome, I have to go now.
When we next meet, I will have Naraku's head as a gift.
Yet he is trying so hard.
Do not look like that, Kagome.
You are the woman who is going to be my wife.
You promised long, long before you met me...
And yet you are telling me this?
I will make you my wife...
when you come down from the mountain.
Sorry, but I still do not remember.
Koga, you saw the rainbow, did not you?
I said I do not remember any rainbow.
I understand now that you have to go afterthis Naraku.
Is Kagome part of a love triangle with Koga and Ayame?
I think Ayame came to get Koga.
Unlike some otherguy, he is sticking to one and only one.
I will manage something with the elder.
But, I do not plan to give you up.
I am the only one who can be your wife.
M-My woman has to be able to sense the Sacred Jewel shards!
Then I will make myself be able to see it, too!
Make yourself able to see it?
If you train, can you make yourself see the Sacred Jewel shards like Kagome?
But I think she is going to do it.
She is full of confidence, too.
Why do not you leave those shards that are in yourlegs here?!
I think Koga's idea about using his wolves makes sense.
If the scent was a problem, why did Naraku leave his trash?
is confident that he will never be located.
That makes a lot of sense.
Where do you think Naraku went?
You figure the rest out yourself.
So he did not figure it out yet.
I got to keep it together...
The place where Naraku escaped to...
The place where no one can touch him...
How do we locate such a place?
We were close to the river on that night, too.
I do not feel like I will lose to Naraku.
But there is no guarantee that I will be alive
Ayame, forget about the night of the lunar rainbow.
I will not everforget that you protected me.
Just when I am able to break through Naraku's barrier...
Are you still going to rely on Koga?
Even his fiancee from the Wolf-Demon Tribe left him.
And you are going to depend on a guy like that?!
You are the one who started it!
Just continue what you were saying.
If only Inuyasha could be a bit more forthright...
Are not no such thing as a rainbow at night.
To people who can see it.
all these demons who have lain low have begun to act up.
Thanks to them, Demon Slayers have lots of work.
How can that old woman exorcist endure this demonic aura?
She must be really powerful... or really dense.
Let us clean this up and go home.
Next on Inuyasha: The Evil Within Demon's Head Castle
